content:
The number of victims as a result of the Russian blow on March 27 increased to 16 people.

About thisreportedHead of Kharkiv Regional State Administration Oleg Synigubov.

"According to preliminary data, today the enemy for the first time on Kharkiv struck the most managed ammunition of large caliber," - wrote Oleg Synigubov.

Aviation use to hit KharkovconfirmedAnd the head of the investigative police department of Kharkiv region Sergey Bolvinov.

“Kharkiv was hit by airbots-for the first time since 2022. It is a D-30 CHU, made on the basis of FAB-250. We have two arrivals - the first hit by a comprehensive school, the second right in the middle of residential buildings, " - wrote Sergey Bolvinov.

He noted that the Russians have not used aviation to strike on residential quarters of Kharkiv for two years.

Later, the head of Kharkiv Ova Oleg Synigubov reported that the Russian UMPB D-30 ammunition was used to strike on Kharkiv, which by the power of the explosion-the average between the airbots and the rocket, is used both from the aircraft and the Smerch RSSU.

Asreported earlier Armyinform,As a result of a blow to Kharkov, one person was killed.
title: The enemy for the first time in two years hit Kharkiv aircraft
description: This was reported by the head of the Kharkiv Regional State Administration Oleg Synigubov. "By...
author: Army Inform
